attr.name: for
attr.description: A list of IDs of other elements, indicating that those elements contributed input values to (or otherwise affected) the calculation.

attr.name: form
attr.description: The form element that this element is associated with (its "form owner"). The value of the attribute must be an ID of a form element in the same document. If this attribute is not specified, the output element must be a descendant of a form element. This attribute enables you to place output elements anywhere within a document, not just as descendants of their form elements.

omission: None, both the starting and ending tag are mandatory.
parents: Any element that accepts phrasing content.
